text: Riya Sisodiya is an Indian actress and model who appeared in Tabrez Noorani and David Womark's 2018 film Love Sonia. She featured on cover of Verve India,Travel+Leisure India & South Asia Magazine. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Language |- |2018 |Love Sonia |Preeti |Hindi |} ==References== ==External links== *at Bollywood Hungama Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Indian film actresses Category:21st-century Indian actresses
title: Riya Sisodiya
